solution_line_template: They ate a total of {pieces_eaten_each} x {num_people} = <<{pieces_eaten_each}*{num_people}={total_eaten}>>{total_eaten} pieces of candy after the event.
So, Travis and his brother have {total_collected} - {total_eaten} = <<{total_collected}-{total_eaten}={candy_left}>>{candy_left} pieces of candy left.
